title: Critique Required Please
content:
![SIM logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821131749im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/34646.gif)   
Rebranding this mark for a small/regional company who are distributors of mid-range to high end office furniture. They've been in business since 1986. URL: [www.shaddy.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821131749/http:/www.shaddy.com/)  
   
The toughest part was finding the right font for the word SIM. In these sketches, the word SIM uses Argus Extra Bold and for the tagline Eurostile or Helvetica Neue. I invite any suggestions and/or alternatives for font use, color scheme, and design.   
   
Best,   
MJ
